data.content: In this lesson, you will learn about the use of English to describe leisure activities or things done in one's free time.

• You will listen to audio and recognise words used to describe leisure activities.
  • You will speak briefly about the activities you do at leisure, based on word cues.
  • You will read simple illustrated texts about leisure activities.
  • You will also write about the leisure activities that you like or dislike, based on audio visual cues.
